name: Crazy Stuntman Rider: Challeng
description:
Become a stuntman bike rider and take full advantage of tricky impossible platform for bike racing. We will give you real train drive atmosphere, beach atmosphere, and dirt atmosphere to ride best jump rider on extreme impossible tricky tracks. This is the ultimate motorbike tricks master stunts game. Crazy Stuntman Rider: Challenge Track offers to become real superhero stunt tricky bike rider.

Game Features:
• Realistic stunts tracks and jumping ramps
• A variety of heavy bikes
• High quality graphics enjoyable heavy stunts driving physics
• Multi modes camera and best music interface
• Challenging stunts with full of thrills
• Difficult levels to make you expert driver
• Tough unique and breath taking stunts
• Super cool environment and best gorgeous physics engine bikes
